text: i pravakta tana prabhuvu taraphu nundi, tanapai avatarimpajeyabadina danini visvasincadu mariyu (ade vidhanga) visvasulu kuda (visvasincaru). Varanta allah nu, ayana dutalanu, ayana granthalanu mariyu ayana pravaktalanu visvasincaru. Varantaru: "Memu ayana pravaktala madhya elanti bhedabhavalanu cupamu. Mariyu memu (adesam) vinnamu mariyu danini sirasavahincamu, ni ksamabhiksanu arthistunnamu, o ma prabhu! Ma gamyasthanam ni vaipuke undi
